title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I have no friends at all, I am most introverted and shy person. so I haven't made any friends in college, school, etc. I think they don't have interest in things that i like.. like tech, how things works, making money, etc. I like curious people who learn and teach something new. I know having fun with friends is important but they don't talk and teach something new and interesting(all things are in my imagination) so how do i make new friends who also are like me? in this forum also very brave and intelligent people, but we cannot meet them in place because they are here because of their privacy. so anyone indian from this forum met any other user inplace? and what are the best places to find intelligent friends from i can learn something?

comments.author: LucyFurr
comments.body: Everyone is different like someone may be talkative while others are not really comfortable with talking others and you will get past with that over the time.I don't know anyone from bitcointalk here either it doesn't mean you can be friends by share your feelings like here in off topic.

comments.author: CCMS
comments.created_time: September 30, 2023, 04:30:49 AMLast edit: December 01, 2023, 04:31:39 PM by CCMS
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on August 11, 2023, 03:09:50 PMI have no friends at all, I am most introverted and shy person. so I haven't made any friends in college, school, etc. I think they don't have interest in things that i like.. like tech, how things works, making money, etc. I like curious people who learn and teach something new. I know having fun with friends is important but they don't talk and teach something new and interesting(all things are in my imagination) so how do i make new friends who also are like me? in this forum also very brave and intelligent people, but we cannot meet them in place because they are here because of their privacy. so anyone indian from this forum met any other user inplace? and what are the best places to find intelligent friends from i can learn something?There is certainly a place there for everyone like you . This place has a name and is called Utopia P2P . I suggest you to join below channel which is for Indians: UtopiaP2P

comments.author: Parvati_j
comments.body: @cafter, I believe I have found someone  who also has same characters, shy and tech related. But I focus more on techs related to electrical because that my field of study, how about you whats your specialization? Â I must admit when it comes to online charting I am open to everyone but when it come to real life, even saying hi is like am talking too much
